(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP think)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADJP (JJ appropriate)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB start)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT this) (CD nine) (NN part) (NN series))
                      (PP (IN on)
                        (NP (DT the) (NNP Old) (NNP Airport) (NNP Road) (NNP Food) (NNP Centre))))
                    (PP (IN with)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the)
                          (ADJP (RB very) (JJ famous))
                          (NNP Nam) (NNP Sing) (NNP Hokkien) (NN Mee))
                        (SBAR
                          (WHNP (WDT which))
                          (S
                            (VP (VBZ is)
                              (VP (VBN regarded)
                                (PP (IN as)
                                  (NP
                                    (NP (DT the) (JJS best) (JJ Hokkien) (NN Mee))
                                    (PP (IN in)
                                      (NP (JJ many)
                                        (NP (DT a) (NNS makankakis) (POS '))))))))))))))))))))))


nsubj(think-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, think-2)

cop(appropriate-5, is-4)
ccomp(think-2, appropriate-5)
aux(start-7, to-6)
xcomp(appropriate-5, start-7)
det(series-11, this-8)
num(series-11, nine-9)
nn(series-11, part-10)
dobj(start-7, series-11)
prep(series-11, on-12)
det(Centre-18, the-13)
nn(Centre-18, Old-14)
nn(Centre-18, Airport-15)
nn(Centre-18, Road-16)
nn(Centre-18, Food-17)

prep(start-7, with-19)
det(Mee-26, the-20)
advmod(famous-22, very-21)
amod(Mee-26, famous-22)
nn(Mee-26, Nam-23)
nn(Mee-26, Sing-24)
nn(Mee-26, Hokkien-25)
pobj(with-19, Mee-26)
nsubjpass(regarded-29, which-27)
auxpass(regarded-29, is-28)
rcmod(Mee-26, regarded-29)
prep(regarded-29, as-30)
det(Mee-34, the-31)
amod(Mee-34, best-32)
amod(Mee-34, Hokkien-33)

  (S
    (NP (NNP Old) (NNP Airport) (NNP Road) (NNP Food) (NNP Centre))

        (NP (DT an) (JJ amazing) (NNP Food) (NNP Centre))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ has)
              (S
                (NP (JJ many) (JJ good) (NNS things))
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB eat)))))))))
    (. .)))

    (PP
      (NP
        (NP (RB just) (JJ good) (NNS prawns)
          (CC and)
          (NN ikan) (NNS bilis))
        (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
          (NP (NNP Anchovies))
          (-RRB- -RRB-)))
      (IN in)
      (NP (DT the) (NN stock)))
    (, ,)))

appos(prawns-3, Anchovies-8)
